abstract: Goldman Sachs reported that its trading revenues topped $100 million on 46 separate trading days last quarter, a record for the Wall Street firm.
snippet: Goldman Sachs reported that its trading revenues topped $100 million on 46 separate trading days last quarter, a record for the Wall Street firm.
lead_paragraph: It was just three months ago that Goldman Sachs, the investment bank run by Lloyd C. Blankfein, disclosed that it had 34 days in the first quarter during which it generated more than $100 million in trading revenue.
